channel.title: Whonix site download and other logs
channel.description:
Does Whonix website keep users logs?
If I downloaded the VMs without Tor, was my IP recorded and kept on the server?
If Whonix site is hacked can this information be obtained by attacker?

item.title: Whonix site download and other logs
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
No logs.

But the internet doesn’t work the way as if a no logs policy would help
you a lot since the traffic is routed through many other servers
beforehand where you don’t know their logging policy.

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix site download and other logs
